Room.Name: Avatar Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Avatar Boulevard, east of the Embassy Court.
Room.LongDescription: There are three major races which inhabit Oceancrest, those being humans, elves and dwarves. Although Oceancrest is considered a "mannish" town, many elves and dwarves also call Oceancrest "home". However, occasionally, they will require to talk to officials of their same race, which is why the Embassy Court was set up. Delegations from both the elven and dwarven races are represented there.
